author: arminw
msg: patch by chris greenlee:
That one ignores an exception thrown if it can't find
a field in the Oracle jdbc driver to modify; the field is only there in
the pre-JDK 1.4 version of the driver, and only needs to be modified for
that driver, so the exception is uninteresting (and expected).

work again. the generated torque script isn't
perfect. the changed classes need some more review.

author: arminw
msg: - update sequence package

use stored procedure to simulate an
'oracle-like' sequence generation (Thanks Ryan)

now use long instead of int ids
- SequenceManagerHighLowImpl now use optimistic
locking
